title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your excitement builds as you discover ways to reinvent your appearance and how you connect to others. The relational Libra New Moon in your 1st House of Self stirs your sense of style, inspiring you to freshen up your seasonal wardrobe. Leave yourself plenty of time to enjoy the experience and play with a variety of looks. Transform your outing into more of a fun social event by taking friends along to help you with your choices. Double your delight by sharing the inner workings of your world. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
